thread.title: Watch The Visuals For Snoop Dogg’s ‘Legend’
thread.title_full: Watch The Visuals For Snoop Dogg’s ‘Legend’

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Watch The Visuals For Snoop Dogg’s ‘Legend’
text:
After over twenty years in the business, Snoop Dogg’s certainly earned himself a moment or two to brag. In the latest video for “Legends,” taken from last year’s Coolaid LP, the rap icon reminded fans of his legendary status.
The opening of the music video also features a trailer for a Coolaid movie, which is rumoured to be coming soon. Snoop will star in this film based on his life with the latest album serving as the soundtrack.
The release comes just a few days after SPINES announced that the brand has partnered with the veteran rapper to present its 2017 spring collection. Despite not being at the forefront of hip-hop as much anymore, it’s good to see Snoop Dogg so active.
In other news, take a look inside Daft Punk’s LA pop-up store.
